#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned ll
#define N 50009
#define mod 1000000007

ll mpow(ll a,ll b)
{
    ll res =1;
    while(b)
    {
        if(b&1)res = (res*a)%mod;
        a = (a*a)%mod;
        b = b/2;
    }
    return res;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,k;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
        ll a= (((k*k)%mod) -(3*k)%mod + 3 + mod)%mod;
        ll ans = (((mpow(a,n-1)*(k))%mod)*(k-1))%mod;
        if(ans<0)ans+= mod;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }


    return 0;
}
